title: Review: Devinci E-Cartier EP8 LTD – A Refined Electric Commuter Bike
content:
Devinci has a well-established presence in most categories. Now they’ve jumped all the way into the busy commuter e-bike segment with a very capable lineup.

Read the full article at Review: Devinci E-Cartier EP8 LTD – A Refined Electric Commuter Bike on Velo.
author: Mike Kazimer
